sentence_zh_TW: 儘管時間已經過去很久，我仍然記得那些美好的時光，讓我感到懷念。
sentence: Even though a lot of time has passed, I ______ remember those wonderful moments, leaving me with nostalgia.

sentence_zh_TW: 在活動結束後，我們決定要早點離開，以避免交通擁堵帶來的不便。
sentence: After the event concludes, we decided to ______ early to avoid the inconvenience of traffic congestion.

sentence_zh_TW: 所有市民都應該參與這場公共會議，因為它會影響未來的發展。

sentence_zh_TW: 在進入這個特定的社區之前，您需要事先取得批准。
sentence: Before you ______ this specific community, you must obtain approval in advance.

sentence_zh_TW: 在街道的某個角落，有一家非常受歡迎的咖啡館，常常吸引許多人。
sentence: On a certain ______ of the street, there is a very popular café that often attracts many people.

sentence_zh_TW: 雖然公共交通工具很方便，但有時在城市裡打計程車會更快。
sentence: Although public transportation is convenient, sometimes taking a ______ in the city can be faster.

sentence_zh_TW: 這位男人因其出色的領導能力和智慧而受到社區的尊重。
sentence: This ______ is respected in the community for his outstanding leadership and intelligence.

sentence_zh_TW: 每年的九月，學校會重新開學，學生們都準備迎接新學期的開始。
sentence: Every year in ______, schools reopen, and students are ready to embrace the start of a new term.

sentence_zh_TW: 小孩們經常喜歡看那些充滿魔法的故事，充滿了奇幻的場景和角色。
sentence: Children often love stories full of ______, filled with fantastical scenes and characters.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個城市裡，用自行車出行是一種既環保又便捷的交通方式。
sentence: In this city, using a ______ is an eco-friendly and convenient way to get around.

sentence_zh_TW: 在炎熱的夏天，去游泳池游泳是一個非常受歡迎的消遣方式。
sentence: During the hot summer, swimming in the ______ is a very popular pastime.

sentence_zh_TW: 我們希望能在指定的時間之前到達會議室，以做好準備。
sentence: We hope to ______ the meeting room before the designated time to be prepared.

sentence_zh_TW: 在寄信之前，不要忘記把信放進信封裡，這樣才能確保它安全送達。
sentence: Before mailing the letter, don't forget to put it in an ______ to ensure it is delivered safely.

sentence_zh_TW: 這本書包含了有用的資訊，能幫助你在生活中的各種情況下取得成功。
sentence: This book contains ______ information that can help you succeed in various situations in life.

sentence_zh_TW: 在週末，人們經常到當地的市場去購買新鮮的水果和蔬菜。
sentence: On weekends, people often go to the local ______ to buy fresh fruits and vegetables.

sentence_zh_TW: 我們昨天收到了從亞馬遜訂購的包裹，裡面是一台新手機。
sentence: We received a ______ yesterday that we ordered from Amazon, and it contained a new phone.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個生意在過去幾年的增長令人印象深刻，許多人都希望能加入。

sentence_zh_TW: 他在商店裡找到了兩條非常合適的褲子，準備在聚會上穿。

sentence_zh_TW: 如果你在十字路口不確定哪條路是正確的，應該仔細觀察交通標誌。
sentence: If you're unsure which way is ______ at the intersection, you should carefully observe the traffic signs.
